rating_comment:
When i saw this flat on AirBnB, it seemed almost too good to be true. There must be a catch!
But everything was as perfect as it seemed online. Mr. Sayem and his associate Mr. Tarek is the most thoughtful, gracious host.
He provided us with all the information we needed and showed us around. The flat is just perfect!
Kitchen is compact and contains everything one needs.
The bed is comfortable, bathroom and terrace are excellent. Location is incredible.
Our main concern was the hospital (evercare) which was near to this location.
So basically the area is quiet but still close to everything you need
But They went way beyond to make our long-weekend comfortable and memorable. We will be back soon In Sha Allah

We stayed here for almost week and it has been a great experience. The house was cleaned nicely before we came in and upon request the host also managed additional parking, aerosols and few other things. The host was very cooperative and always proactive in communication. I would stay here if I come to Bangladesh again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Nicely located very spacious, very clean, comfortable well decorated house with lots of amenities located nearby. It has the appeal of our own home. We enjoyed our stay.

I would say it is a cool, nice spacious accommodation for a large size family's vacation house. Everything is within the reach of 10-15 mins rikshaw ride. Car would take more time as usual. Mahmudur was very supportive. There were some maintenance issues, which could've been prevented though. My overall experience gives them 4 stars.

Mahmudur was a very accomodating host and was quick to respond to our messages.
The house was extremely spacious and clean, with lots of towels in each room. With a large supermarket about 5 minutes away from the house, it was easy for us to go out to buy groceries.
The location was in a residential area, so it was safe.
I would recommend this apartment.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: An amazing stay at Mahmudur’s place. It almost felt like a home away from home. It was very clean and spacious. The netting around the building to prevent mosquitos from entering and the AC’s made it a very comfortable stay. It was well equipped with an ironing board/iron, hairdryers, fridge/freezer, washing machine/tumble dryer. Thank you for making it a pleasant and enjoyable experience.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Nice furnished house, good for 7 members families like us. Plz count the towels before use . I had to pay for 6 towels-3000 tk - don’t even know how it get lost. Thanks

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: It was a perfect accommodations for large families. Clean and guards r helpful. Thanks
